scripts.build:gh-pages-tags: rm -rf gh-pages/tags/articleTags.json && mkdir -p gh-pages/tags && node bin/articleTags.js
scripts.build:gh-pages-words: rm -rf gh-pages/tags/articleWords.json && mkdir -p gh-pages/tags  && node bin/articleWords.js
scripts.build:gh-pages-gitlogs: rm -rf gh-pages/gitlogs && mkdir -p gh-pages/content/posts && bash bin/gitlogs.sh
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run build:gh-pages-gitlogs && npm run build:gh-pages-tags && npm run build:gh-pages-words
